targets.query:
from(bucket: "dust")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "sapflow-sensor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "alphaInner")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_id"] == "${DeviceId}")
  |> drop(columns: ["codingRate", "diagnostic"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "dust")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "sapflow-sensor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "alphaOuter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_id"] == "${DeviceId}")
  |> drop(columns: ["codingRate", "diagnostic"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "dust")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "sapflow-sensor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "sapFlow")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_id"] == "${DeviceId}")
  |> drop(columns: ["codingRate", "diagnostic"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 24h, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "sum")

from(bucket: "dust")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "sapflow-sensor")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "alphaInner" or r["_field"] == "alphaOuter" or r["_field"] == "betaInner" or r["_field"] == "betaOuter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["device_id"] == "${DeviceId}")
  |> drop(columns: ["codingRate", "diagnostic"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")
